sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>building</radical> has <radical>easy</radical> access to <kanji>sunshine</kanji>. It's big and tall, so the <kanji>sunlight</kanji> shines right onto its roof.
meaningInfo: You're standing on top of the building as the sunshine comes down. Its warm light fills your entire body as it covers the building with ease.
readingMnemonic: Standing in <kanji>sunshine</kanji> for this long has worked up your appetite, so you take a <reading>yo</reading>gurt (<ja>よう</ja>) cup out of your bag and eat it.
readingInfo: Feel the sunlight on your face and taste the yogurt on your tongue. What flavor is it? Try to imagine it as vividly as you can so that sunlight always tastes like yogurt from now on.
